channel.title: Products Changelog on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Products Changelog on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Changelog
item.description: To make it easier for users and contributors to see precisely what notable changes have been made on HotelX product. All notable changes on our platform will be documented in this page. 2018-08-22 Settings heritage. Guide Plugins filter Fix bugs 2018-08-21 New input field in hotels query filter. This allows to filter the response by hotel’s country. GraphQL Schema updated. 2018-07-24 New plugin, safety margin.

item.title: Products changelogs
